page.title: 20STATISTICS-WEST BERGHOLT
page.content: (SEE PAGE 17 FOR EXPLANATION) {LEISURE ACTIVITIES (IN ANY ONE MONTH) TRIP TO SEASIDE 6{44}TRIP TO PARK 2{26 TRIP TO COUNTRY 2{26}CINEMA 7{4 HISTORIC BUILDINGS 8{20} THEATRE/BALLET4{12} MUSEUM/ART GALLERY 3{14} AMATEUR PRODUCTION 3{22} LEISURE CLASSES 2{4 }DANCING 11{28 FAIR/AMUSEMENT ARCADE 1{12 OUT FOR A MEAL 40{54} OUT FOR A DRINK 54{60 }GARDENING 44{80 LISTENING TO RECORDS 63{64 } D.I.Y. 36{56} KNITTING/SEWING 27{28 READING BOOKS 56{68 {(ALL STATISTICS GATHERED IN JULY,WHICH {WILL HAVE A DIRECT BEARING ON TOTALS) ************************************** ALL INFORMATION COLLECTED AND EDITED BY CLASSES 8 AND 9 OF HEATHLANDS PRIMARY SCHOOL,WEST BERGHOLT,ESSEX. 19.7.85
